page.title: 13MARBLES
page.content: { Marbles}is a game where you have to get two or more small glass objects into a hole. The one who gets the last marble into the hole wins the rest of the marbles. There are about twelve sorts of marbles. They all have different values,the smallest being the "ONNER". A "TANK" =1563 "ONNERS". The "TANK"is the largest marble and worth the most. THE REST ARE: ONNER DOBBER PIG'S EYE TWOER TANK SEETHROUGH MILKY SPIDER BLACK MAGIC OZZY SIXTEENER OZZYDOBBER. RULES: LAG:I go last. FINGERS:Use your fingers. FREINDLIES:You keep your own marbles. HOOKS & EGGS:You are allowed to flick the marbles up. CLEARS:You can clear away obstructions. TOUCH:To touch the marble without moving it. TAKES:You take the marble(s) out of the hole.
